SYN_BRONCH_5_5: Cystic fibrosis patient with a cavity in the right lower lobe. put him to sleep general anesthesia. went down with the hybrid scope. Saw pus coming from the RLL superior seg. Did a BAL there. Saw a cavity with a fungus ball inside. Biopsied it with forceps. It bled a moderate amount so we used epinephrine and ice water and wedged the scope until it stopped. Extubated fine sent to recovery.
